name: Prince Kumar Rai
college: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

education.school: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam Technical University

projects.name: CRYPTO-BYTE(Team-Project)
projects.description: Developed a high-impact crypto tracking platform using React.js, Chart.js, and Material UI, resulting in 30% higher user engagement and 20% lower bounce rate for rapid decision-making in the volatile cryptocurrency market. Engineered a backend system for in-depth analysis of 200+ cryptocurrencies, featuring sorted lists based on market cap and detailed insights into rank and market cap. Integrated temporal analysis functionalities, enabling users to visualize crypto performance over 24 hours, a week, a month, and a year for a comprehensive market perspective.

projects.name: TESLA CLONE
projects.description: Designed an interactive user interface (UI) that replicates 10% of Tesla websites functionality and aesthetics. Implemented React to drive efficient and reusable component development, resulting in a 20% reduction in code duplication and enhancing project maintainability. Utilized Vites speedy build tool to enhance performance, resulting in a 50% improvement in loading times and delivering a faster, more immersive user experience. Ensured mobile responsiveness for the Tesla clone, enhancing accessibility and visual appeal across diverse devices.

experiences.description: Enhanced web app performance by incorporating the ReactJS framework, resulting in a 40% reduction in page load time and heightened user satisfaction. Strengthened web application security by 20% through the implementation of user authentication and authorization using JWT tokens. Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, resolved complex issues and ensured 2x faster project delivery. Improved website load times by 20% through code optimization and performance enhancements.

Developed a web application and integrated 50+ real-time contest data via APIs. Utilized over 3 technologies to develop the web app, showcasing versatility in tool selection and implementation. Conducted testing and quality assurance to ensure the web applications functionality and performance by 40%. Collaborated with 3 team members and also gained valuable hands-on experience in web development and project management, further enhancing my technical skills.

full_output.name: Prince Kumar Rai
achievements_and_awards: Awarded a prestigious Rs. 200000/- by HDFC for outstanding academic and extracurricular performances.
Received SSB recommendation for 2021 batch, unfortunately medically disqualified due to eye vision.
Dedicated over 1 year to consistently solving 600+ Data Structures and Algorithms problems on LeetCode, showcasing a strong commitment to technical skill enhancement.
Achieved 2-star with Rating - 1519, out of 4000 students in CODECHEFs Starters 98 contest.
Achieved 2nd rank in QUIZOPEDIA 2022 by Classroom Study, with a strong grasp of relevant subject.
